what.question: What is a desktop pet?
what.answer: A desktop pet is a small animated character that lives on your computer screen and interacts with your activities.

how.question: How does it work?
how.answer: Our AI technology generates unique pets based on your preferences. You can customize their appearance and behavior.

system.question: What systems are supported?
system.answer: Our desktop pets work on Windows, macOS, and Linux systems.

CTA.title: Transform Your Desktop with AI Companions
CTA.description: YCamie brings your favorite characters to life on your screen in minutes. No artistic skills needed - just describe or upload an image, and watch your desktop come alive!

0.question: What features do YCamie Shimeji pets have?
0.answer:
Our AI model is specially trained to generate high-quality desktop pets. Each Shimeji includes:

  • Basic: 25 high-quality animation frames
  • Advanced: 46 premium animation frames
  • Don't worry about the system requirements, our product handles everything automatically for you!
  • Interactive AI Chat
  • Character Customization
  • Customize the pet's appearance and behavior
  • Complete animation system

1.question: What are the system requirements?
1.answer:
To run YCamie Shimeji pets, you need:

  • Using YCamie? You're all set! No additional setup required - everything is included in our package.
  • Don't need to install Java 21 or higher installed on your computer

2.question: How can I get better generation results?
2.answer:
For best results, we recommend:

  • Use simple and clear descriptions
  • Upload a reference image to improve accuracy
  • Try regenerating if you're not satisfied with the results

3.question: What's your refund policy?
3.answer: We offer a full refund within 7 days of purchase if you're not satisfied with our service. Please contact us at support@ycamie.com

4.question: Need help with something else?
4.answer:
If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to reach out through:

  • Check our documentation
